message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small slice of the pie. We can always negotiate further, but remember, the money loses value with each round!
Alice, your generosity is appreciated, but let's be fair. This is my counter-offer.  We can settle this now and avoid further losses to inflation.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident we can find a more balanced split.  Let's try to get closer to the middle ground this time. Remember, with each round, the money is worth less.
